data.name: Idle Champions - Champions of Renown: Year 3 All-Star Pack
data.detailed_description:
We've picked some of our favourite Champions from Year 3 and bundled them together to help you gear them up!

Skins are alternate looks for your Champions that you can swap in and out whenever you want!

In this Pack:
Unlocks the following event Champions (if you haven't already unlocked them in game): Avren, Havilar, Krull, Melf, and Nova.

Krull's Mastermind Krull Skin

16 Avren Gold Event Chests with 2 guaranteed shiny equipment cards
16 Krull Gold Event Chests with 2 guaranteed shiny equipment cards
16 Havilar Gold Event Chests with 2 guaranteed shiny equipment cards
16 Melf Gold Event Chests with 2 guaranteed shiny equipment cards
16 Nova Gold Event Chests with 2 guaranteed shiny equipment cards
